text:
RENO, Nev. (PRWEB) June 05, 2020

[MemoryCare.com](http://MemoryCare.com), a comprehensive resource for
caregivers and older adults living with memory impairment, has announced the
Best Memory Care Facilities in Reno, Nevada. The guide identifies 5 memory
care communities based on location, access to experts, facility features and
amenities.

According to the Alzheimer's Association, 5.6 million people age 65 and older
are living with Alzheimer's dementia. In Reno, the number of senior deaths
related to Alzheimer's increased by 30 percent between 2013 and 2017. Memory
care facilities offer activities and therapies to help delay or halt cognitive
decline. They also give family members and caregivers peace of mind by
providing a safe environment for loved ones.

"There's a high demand for quality memory care all across our nation;
specifically, in cities like Reno, which experienced a rapid increase in
Alzheimer's related deaths," says Joyce Collins.
"[MemoryCare.com](http://MemoryCare.com) provides free resources to help
families find the best facilities."

Through hours of research and an intensive selection process,
[MemoryCare.com](http://MemoryCare.com) was designed to help caregivers find
effective solutions for their loved ones. The website not only highlights the
best facilities in the city, it also shares information about cost, reviews
from residents, type of care offered and more. For a detailed listing of the
Best Memory Care Facilities in Reno, NV, please visit
<https://www.memorycare.com/facilities-in-reno-nv/>

2020 Best Memory Care Facilities in Reno, NV (in alphabetical order)

[Arbors Memory Care Community](https://www.arborsmemorycare.com/)  
Phone Number: (775) 525-7058  
Address: 2121 E. Prater Way, Sparks, NV 89434  
Website: [arborsmemorycare.com/](http://arborsmemorycare.com/)

[Brookdale Reno](https://www.brookdale.com/en/communities/brookdale-reno.html)  
Phone Number: (775) 234-2321  
Address: 3105 Plumas St., Reno, NV 89509  
Website: [brookdale.com/en/communities/brookdale-
reno.html](http://brookdale.com/en/communities/brookdale-reno.html)

[Stone Valley](https://www.sunshineretirementliving.com/stone-valley-assisted-
living-reno/?utm_source=local&utm_medium=organic&utm_campaign=gmb)  
Phone Number: (775) 210-1228  
Address: 6155 Stone Valley Dr., Reno, NV 89523  
Website: [sunshineretirementliving.com/](http://sunshineretirementliving.com/)

[Summit Estates Senior Living](http://www.summitestatessl.net/)  
Phone Number: (775) 434-1880  
Address: 222 E. Patriot Blvd., Reno, NV 89511  
Website: [summitestatessl.net/](http://summitestatessl.net/)

[The Seasons of Reno](https://www.pegasusseniorliving.com/the-seasons-of-
reno/memory-care/)  
Phone Number: (775) 431-2910  
Address: 5165 Summit Ridge Ct., Reno, NV 89523  
Website: [pegasusseniorliving.com/the-seasons-of-reno/memory-
care/](http://pegasusseniorliving.com/the-seasons-of-reno/memory-care/)

ABOUT [MEMORYCARE.COM](http://MEMORYCARE.COM)  
[MemoryCare.com](http://MemoryCare.com) provides tools and resources to help
adults living with memory impairment and their families. The online guide uses
data-driven research and expert evaluations to identify the best facilities
across the nation. The [MemoryCare.com](http://MemoryCare.com) team includes
medical and elder care professionals as well as board of directors. For more
information, visit <https://www.memorycare.com/>.

Read the full story at
<https://www.prweb.com/releases/memorycare_com_names_the_best_facilities_for_senior_memory_care_in_reno_nv/prweb17080421.htm>

title: MemoryCare.com Names the Best Facilities for Senior  Memory Care in Reno, NV
html:
RENO, Nev. (PRWEB) June 05, 2020

MemoryCare.com, a comprehensive resource for caregivers and older adults living with memory impairment, has announced the Best Memory Care Facilities in Reno, Nevada. The guide identifies 5 memory care communities based on location, access to experts, facility features and amenities.

According to the Alzheimer's Association, 5.6 million people age 65 and older are living with Alzheimer's dementia. In Reno, the number of senior deaths related to Alzheimer's increased by 30 percent between 2013 and 2017. Memory care facilities offer activities and therapies to help delay or halt cognitive decline. They also give family members and caregivers peace of mind by providing a safe environment for loved ones.

"There's a high demand for quality memory care all across our nation; specifically, in cities like Reno, which experienced a rapid increase in Alzheimer's related deaths," says Joyce Collins. "MemoryCare.com provides free resources to help families find the best facilities."

Through hours of research and an intensive selection process, MemoryCare.com was designed to help caregivers find effective solutions for their loved ones. The website not only highlights the best facilities in the city, it also shares information about cost, reviews from residents, type of care offered and more. For a detailed listing of the Best Memory Care Facilities in Reno, NV, please visit https://www.memorycare.com/facilities-in-reno-nv/

2020 Best Memory Care Facilities in Reno, NV (in alphabetical order)

Arbors Memory Care Community
Phone Number: (775) 525-7058
Address: 2121 E. Prater Way, Sparks, NV 89434
Website: arborsmemorycare.com/

Brookdale Reno
Phone Number: (775) 234-2321
Address: 3105 Plumas St., Reno, NV 89509
Website: brookdale.com/en/communities/brookdale-reno.html

Stone Valley
Phone Number: (775) 210-1228
Address: 6155 Stone Valley Dr., Reno, NV 89523
Website: sunshineretirementliving.com/

Summit Estates Senior Living
Phone Number: (775) 434-1880
Address: 222 E. Patriot Blvd., Reno, NV 89511
Website: summitestatessl.net/

The Seasons of Reno
Phone Number: (775) 431-2910
Address: 5165 Summit Ridge Ct., Reno, NV 89523
Website: pegasusseniorliving.com/the-seasons-of-reno/memory-care/

ABOUT MEMORYCARE.COM
MemoryCare.com provides tools and resources to help adults living with memory impairment and their families. The online guide uses data-driven research and expert evaluations to identify the best facilities across the nation. The MemoryCare.com team includes medical and elder care professionals as well as board of directors. For more information, visit https://www.memorycare.com/.

Read the full story at https://www.prweb.com/releases/memorycare_com_names_the_best_facilities_for_senior_memory_care_in_reno_nv/prweb17080421.htm
